Text:
A/V is really good. Thanks uploader!

HOWEVER this movie has been dubbed in English and the voice actors are REALLY BAD!   It's completely cringe-worthy (or laugh-inducing) to listen to these c-list, out of work porn actors murder their lines.

For those of you who like to hear the actors actual voices and don't mind subtitles, I would look here:  

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8128088/Blacks.Game.2012.BRRip.XviD-DiN

Release the original version with subs in x264!
Dubbing should be banned.
